title: Smith makes it a family ride with 2 new youth MIPS helmets
content:
Smith recently introduced two new youth helmets to its cycling lineup. The Wilder Jr. and Zip Jr. helmets come with pro-level MIPS technology in a kid-sized package. There’s a lot the two noggin shells have in common, but let’s talk about what sets each one apart. Wilder Jr. Youth MIPS Helmet: MTB ready The Wilder

The post Smith makes it a family ride with 2 new youth MIPS helmets appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jilli Cluff
